business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: Your Trusted HR Partner
ShortDescription: Global Professional Services (GPS) A professional company with a long history of providing consulting services
enhanced_description: Global Professional Services (GPS) is a professional consulting firm based in Lebanon, specializing in a broad range of business sectors. As a trusted HR partner, GPS offers extensive experience in human resources, governance, strategic planning, development planning, and resource management. Their services extend to auditing, financial and tax consulting, record keeping, vocational training, capacity building, translation, and protection of intellectual property and trademarks. GPS provides both external and internal services, including specialized areas such as fraud investigation. A core objective of their offerings is to accelerate skill development and enhance learning efficiency within organizations.
competitive_advantages: Extensive experience across multiple business sectors
Comprehensive suite of consulting services covering HR, finance, legal, and training
roi_benefits: Risk mitigation through fraud investigation and auditing
compliance_features: Intellectual property and trademark legal compliance
Fraud detection and investigation for internal compliance
